title: Lv 31,, no Level capsule?
body: I just hit lv 31 and nothing came up on my screen for it, and I got no champion capsule. Help please.

replies.body: Not sure what seems to be happening with these level up capsules lately, but I've got this one added for ya! If this happens again be sure to submit a ticket to our game team asap so they can track and get this fixed asap!
